mn35:5.4: yathā ca me → yathāssa me (bj, pts1)
mn35:5.8: vālaṃ → thālaṃ (s1-3, mr), nipphoṭeyya → nicchodeyya (bj) | nippoṭheyya (s1-3, km) | nicchādeyya (pts1, mr) | nicchoṭeyya (mr)
mn35:16.6: tissaṃ vedanāyaṃ → tāyaṃ vedanāyaṃ (bj) | tāya vedanāya (s1-3, pts1)
mn35:23.9: vipphanditāni tānipi sabbāni → vipphanditāni kānici kānici tāni (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn35:24.2: () → (mukharosi tvaṃ dummukha) (bj, s1-3, km), āgamehi tvaṃ, dummukha → etthantare pāṭho sī potthake
